title: Nneɛma a Ɛho Hia & Nsɛm a Wɔaka - Orbital Temple
heading: Nneɛma atitiriw & Nsɛm a Wɔaka
description: Saa adwinni a wɔde mfe pii ayɛ yi yɛ Mercosul Bienal a ɛto so 13 a wɔyɛe wɔ Porto Alegre, Brazil, a Marcelo Dantas na ɔhwɛɛ so no fã. Wɔakyerɛw no bere tenten ama Lumen Nkonimdi 2022 - Daakye Abasobɔde. Ɛsan nso adi nkonim wɔ ArtSat Category a ɛwɔ CubeDesign 2021 akansi no mu, a Brazil Ahunmu Nhwehwɛmu Asoɛe (INPE) na ɛhyɛ ho nkuran.

imageAlts.mercosul: Mercosur Mfirihyia Abien a Wɔde Di Dwuma
